```{r mnist-digit, echo=FALSE}
plot_picture <- function(x) {
          x %>% 
            as.numeric() %>% 
            matrix(28, 28, byrow = TRUE) %>% 
              apply(2, rev) %>% 
          t() %>% image()
}      
        
digits <- mnist %>% select(-instance, -label) %>% slice_sample(n=5)
          
par(mfrow=c(1,5), mar = c(0.1,0.1,0.1,0.1))
silent <- utils::capture.output(apply(digits, 1, plot_picture))        
```
